lessons.title: Introduction to JavaScript Variables
lessons.description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript variables including var, let, and const declarations.
lessons.content:
What are Variables?

Variables are containers for storing data values.

lessons.title: Data Types in JavaScript
lessons.description: Explore JavaScript's dynamic typing system and learn about primitive and reference data types.
lessons.content:
JavaScript Data Types

JavaScript has dynamic typing, meaning variables can hold values of any type.

lessons.title: Functions and Scope
lessons.description: Master JavaScript functions including function declarations, expressions, and arrow functions.
lessons.content:
JavaScript Functions

Functions are reusable blocks of code that perform specific tasks.
